title: The NEW FASTEST Way to Level Up Hourglass in Sea of Thieves

tasks.task: Playing Guardians of Fortune with a strategy to level up the hourglass using the merchant emissary and treasure grade.
subtasks: Researching the strategy from Toxie Sinclair's video.
Purchasing commodities from merchant stalls to boost faction grade.
Becoming a representative of the Merchant Alliance to buy commodities.
Matching with players to travel to outpost locations to collect and sell commodities.
Participating in PvP battles to gain reputation and defend against invasions.
Selling loot from defeated opponents to obtain legendary items.
Achieving grade 5 faction stash and Athena emissary through repeated battles and sales.
Handling server delays and queue times during fast battles.
